name: I'm Miguel
aboutMeParagraph1: Since I was a child, I've been passionate about computer science. I enjoy software development and I have skills in both Frontend and Backend; my goal is to become a Full Stack Developer in the future.
aboutMeParagraph2: I consider myself a creative and responsible person with a positive attitude. I can adapt to different situations, solve problems, and I value teamwork.

description: Development of Full Stack solutions for internal and external banking projects.
Working with technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, and React.
Development of REST services and microservices for universities using Java.
Development of CAPA-InterAE, a REST interoperability API for universities.
Complete development of Interoperability-Trace, a web application built with Spring Boot and React.
Implementation of forms, academic record integrations, and integration with the Trew@ API.
Additional technologies: TypeScript, Maven, Jenkins, Oracle SQL, JAX-RS, SOAP, REST architecture, among others.
